original_text: As they were travelling along the road, they came to a place with some water. The man said to Philip, ‘Look! There is some water here. Please will you baptize me? Is there anything to stop you?’
korean_text: 길 가다가 물 있는 곳에 이르러 그 내시가 말하되 보라 물이 있으니 내가 세례를 받음에 무슨 거리낌이 있느냐

sentences.original_text: As they were travelling along the road
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 길을 따라 여행하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: they came to a place with some water
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 물이 있는 어떤 곳에 이르렀다

sentences.original_text: Is there anything to stop you?'
